markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Trade Consortium Underling](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=52)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Absalom and Starstone Isle

</column>

Your experience as a ledger-keeper for one of Absalom’s trade guilds has made you a canny investor and shrewd entrepreneur.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Business Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Experienced Professional](/Feats.aspx?ID=778) skill feat.
name: Trade Consortium Underling

text: Trade Consortium Underling Source World Guide pg. 22 2.0 Region Absalom and Starstone Isle Your experience as a ledger-keeper for one of Absalom’s trade guilds has made you a canny investor and shrewd entrepreneur. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Society skill, and the Business Lore skill. You gain the Experienced Professional skill feat.
